page.title: 02Principal Features of Cupar
page.content: Cupar,an old trading town,has many features within its boundaries, including many post_industrial revolution sites as well as older monuments, buildings and parks. Probably the most prominent features on the Cupar {landscape }are the { {churches.}There are five {churches }in the town:-the Old Parish Church,St. John's Church, the Episcopal Church, the Baptist Church and St.Columba's Roman Catholic Church. Other important features in Cupar are the educational establishments. These include Bell Baxter High{School} on three sites,Castlehill Primary and Infant{School}on two sites, St.Columba's Primary{School,}Elmwood Agricultural and Technical College and Dalgairn Adult Training Centre.There are also many{Recreational Facilities} in Cupar.
